headline: RSAC Conference Opens Annual Innovation Sandbox and Launch Pad Contest Submissions
summary: RSA Conference LLC ("RSAC"), the company behind the world's largest and most influential cybersecurity conference, today announced that submissions for the annual RSAC™ Innovation Sandbox and RSAC™ Launch Pad contests have opened and will run through Friday, November 14.

headline: Verizon offers flexible payment arrangements for Federal workers, military, first responders

headline: Glide Identity unveils SIM-anchored, phishing-resistant identity solutions at Authenticate 2025
summary: Glide Identity, a digital identity security company, launches its flagship authentication products, MagicalAuth and SuperPasskey, at Authenticate 2025. The platform is the first SIM-anchored, cryptographically based identity layer designed to protect against AI-enhanced fraud while keeping authentication and verification effortless for users. This launch reiterates Glide's mission: AI-safe, agent-ready continuous identity built for humans and agents.

headline: Verizon Business IoT market survey: IoT a smart bet, AI a major accelerator
summary: Survey of 500 companies finds soaring enthusiasm for the Internet of Things (IoT), with multiple emerging technologies acting as catalysts. Efficiency and productivity gains demonstrate return on investment, while excitement for AI and AI video, 5G and 5G RedCap, network slicing, private wireless, eSIM and more fuels forward optimism. The AI factor: Survey respondents across industries say AI is significantly accelerating IoT demand -- especially as IoT sensors fuel AI-video capabilities -- but
